declarations.comments: Like `bind`/`>>=`, but switches to the latest emitted source using `flatten`.
declarations.title: switchMap

declarations.comments: Like `bindEff`, but switches to the lattest emitted source using `flatten`.
declarations.title: switchMapEff

declarations.comments:
Hacky 'hidden' method for sending `next` to a Stream like with Subjects.
This may only work with streams created with `create'`.
declarations.title: shamefullySendNext

declarations.comments: for creating a `Stream` without a producer. Used for `imitate`.
declarations.title: create'
